subject: Documentary Films and Programs
Basketball
Sports Injuries
Movies
lead_paragraph: A documentary about the Knicks forward Amar’e Stoudemire tells a universal story of survival and reinforces how difficult it is to sustain a successful career as a professional athlete.
snippet: A documentary about the Knicks forward Amar’e Stoudemire tells a universal story of survival and reinforces how difficult it is to sustain a successful career as a professional athlete.
